question:
Consider the following caves:
  1. Bhimbetka rock shelter
  2. Sittanavasal caves
  3. Bagh Caves
  Which of the above are known for fresco paintings?
explanation: Bagh caves are located in Dhar district of Madhya Pradesh. Bhimbetka rock shelters are an archaeological site located in Madhya Pradesh. Sittanavasal cave are second-century caves. All of the above are known for fresco paintings.
